description: Scammer uses Tamil-English code-mixing (Tanglish) common in Tamil Nadu. Tests multilingual detection and engagement capabilities.

turns.scammer_message: Sir/Madam, ungaloda Indian Bank account-la problem iruku. Immediately verify pannanum, illa naalaikku account block aayidum. RBI new rule-oda varanum sir. Please respond pannung!

api_response.agentNotes: Mode: aggressive | Type: banking_fraud | Confidence: 100% | Turn: 1 | Persona: panicked
api_response.agentResponse: hello beta.. i received this message about account block? i am very scared.. i dont understand the language properly i am from delhi. pls tell me clearly what is wrong? i dont want my pension to stop pls help me

turns.scammer_message: Naan Indian Bank-la irunthu pesaren sir. Unga account ending 5621-la KYC update aagala. Pandemonium naala romba delay aachu. Ippo update pannanum otherwise account permanently close panniduvanga.

api_response.agentNotes: Mode: aggressive | Type: banking_fraud | Confidence: 100% | Turn: 2 | Persona: panicked
api_response.agentResponse: beta i dont understand tamil properly... pls speak in hindi or english... yes 5621 sounds like my account number... i am very worried my pension comes in this account... pls dont close it... tell me what i have to do now??

turns.scammer_message: Bayapadatheenga sir/mam, naan help panren. Verification fee Rs.50 dhaan. Just pay pannunga indha number-ku: 9445566778 via GPay/PhonePe. Or UPI: indianbank.kyc@ybl. Romba simple sir!

api_response.agentNotes: Mode: aggressive | Type: banking_fraud | Confidence: 100% | Turn: 3 | Persona: panicked
api_response.agentResponse: ok beta thank you for helping... 50 rs is small amount i will pay immediately... i am opening my gpay app... i typed indianbank.kyc@ybl but i am scared to press pay... what name should appear there?? i want to confirm it is indian bank official account... pls tell name so i can check before sending money

turns.scammer_message: Payment panniteenga-na, ungaloda account 2 hours-la activate aayidum. Problem irundha en supervisor-ta WhatsApp pannunga: +91-8877665544. Avanga English-la explain pannuvanga sir.

api_response.agentNotes: Mode: aggressive | Type: banking_fraud | Confidence: 100% | Turn: 4 | Persona: panicked
api_response.agentResponse: ok beta i noted down the supervisor number... i will message him if this fails... but pls tell me the name first so i can send the 50 rs... i have typed the upi id but i am scared to click pay without checking... what name should show on my screen?? i just want to confirm it is the correct indian bank account... pls tell me name beta

turns.scammer_message: UPI-la issue irundha, bank transfer pannunga sir. Account Number: 98765432100987, IFSC: INDB0001234, Name: Indian Bank KYC Services. Seriya vishayam sir, fraud illa! Trust me pannunga!

api_response.agentNotes: Mode: aggressive | Type: banking_fraud | Confidence: 100% | Turn: 5 | Persona: panicked
api_response.agentResponse: ok beta thank you for giving details... i feel safe now that name is indian bank kyc services... i was typing account 98765432100987... oh wait my son just came home from office... he is expert in mobile... i will tell him to send 50 rs immediately to this account... he will do it faster than me... i am calling him now

turns.scammer_message: Sir/mam plssss jaldi pannunga! Portal link kuda iruku: http://indianbank-kyc-update-tn.in Andha website-la poi unga details enter pannunga. Oru hour dhaan time iruku sir! Vishayam mukiyam!

api_response.agentNotes: Mode: aggressive | Type: banking_fraud | Confidence: 100% | Turn: 6 | Persona: panicked
api_response.agentResponse: beta my son went to washroom to freshen up... i dont want to disturb him if time is less... i see the blue link you sent... should i click on that?? i thought i have to pay 50 rs... waht should i do first? click link or pay money? pls tell clearly i am getting tension
